message.content:
{"id": "2120", 
 "title": "Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)", 
 "description": "The Most Recently Used (MRU) file list is not being persisted between sessions of the workbench.", 
 "OB": "1. Start the workbench.\n2. Open 2 or 3 files.\n3. Shutdown the workbench.", 
 "EB": "4. Restart the workbench.", 
 "SR": "The MRU file list should still contain the previously opened files after the workbench is restarted."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '2120', 'title': 'Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Start workbench.2. Open 2 or 3 files.3. Shutdown workbench.5. Restart.6. '}
